title: IBM Cloud Backup
introduction: IBM Cloud Backup is a full-featured, agent-based backup and recovery system managed through a web interface. Back up data between IBM Cloud servers in one or more IBM Cloud global data centers.

links.title: Getting started with IBM Cloud Backup for Classic

section_highlights.title: IBM Cloud Backup and Restore Options
section_highlights.description: As you deploy workloads on the IBM Cloud via the IBM Cloud Console, Terraform, CLI or language SDKs, it can seem effortless. But backup and restore are required to protect your data and applications.

section_highlights.title: Disaster Recovery vs. Backup: What's the difference?
section_highlights.description: In this lightboard video, Bradley Knapp with IBM Cloud, answers these questions and many more as he breaks down the differences and similarities between disaster recovery and backup.
